body: Essentially, 'variant' does not capture correctly, but '+variant' does, for enabling variants. It was possible to in kokkos e.g. "+serial~openmp" and with kokkos spackage checking for 'serial' and not '+serial', and thus backend would be listed in spack spec but not passed to kokkos configuration. If kokkos is built without a backend choice, it defaults to pthreads - which may be undesirable.
title: kokkos: bugfix for case wherein kokkos backends enabled in spack but not parsed correctly
